mapper.sql: id, mbr_store_order_id, winery_id, mbr_id, take_weight, take_capacity, delivery_mode, package_price, total_package_amt, pay_total_amt, pay_real_amt, order_status, shipping_detail_addr, shipping_province_id, shipping_city_id, shipping_county_id, create_date, modify_date
mapper.insert: insert into m_mbr_take_order (id, mbr_store_order_id, winery_id, mbr_id, take_weight, take_capacity, delivery_mode, package_price, total_package_amt, pay_total_amt, pay_real_amt, order_status, shipping_detail_addr, shipping_province_id, shipping_city_id, shipping_county_id, create_date, modify_date) values (#{id}, #{mbrStoreOrderId}, #{wineryId}, #{mbrId}, #{takeWeight}, #{takeCapacity}, #{deliveryMode}, #{packagePrice}, #{totalPackageAmt}, #{payTotalAmt}, #{payRealAmt}, #{orderStatus}, #{shippingDetailAddr}, #{shippingProvinceId}, #{shippingCityId}, #{shippingCountyId}, #{createDate}, #{modifyDate})
mapper.update:
update m_mbr_take_order
mbr_store_order_id = #{mbrStoreOrderId},
winery_id = #{wineryId},
mbr_id = #{mbrId},
take_weight = #{takeWeight},
take_capacity = #{takeCapacity},
delivery_mode = #{deliveryMode},
package_price = #{packagePrice},
total_package_amt = #{totalPackageAmt},
pay_total_amt = #{payTotalAmt},
pay_real_amt = #{payRealAmt},
order_status = #{orderStatus},
shipping_detail_addr = #{shippingDetailAddr},
shipping_province_id = #{shippingProvinceId},
shipping_city_id = #{shippingCityId},
shipping_county_id = #{shippingCountyId},
create_date = #{createDate},
modify_date = #{modifyDate},
where id = #{id}
